about_the_game:
DLC Girls 002 Eily Brave



The police who goes around the galaxy to catch all the vicious criminals.
That is the role of a Space Cop. Different than when used to act in the existing narrow territory,
now the supply of portal technology is achieved and the method of arresting the vicious criminals is completed.
Police men now not only work within the village, they can go around the whole universe and prevent the criminal activity.
Eily is also one of such police force. However, the new police officer Eily always makes mistakes. Especially, in front of a rough brutal criminal,
she is quite helpless and often misses them right before her eyes. Merely, Eily is not incompetent.
Because of her righteous character, she found a missing child who was alone lost in the universe and received the medal for her acheivements.
She prevented the war among the vessels.
Only in front of rough men, she becomes helpless.

The reason is simple.
Eily herself denies it, but she has the desire to be raped indiscriminately by rough men.
She couldn’t do anything since she herself was mistaken to think such imagination was fear.
Today, like any other day, Eily also gets a scolding from her boss.
Falling a sleep at the state of feeling down, Ailey opens her eyes in the glass world.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not suitable for all ages or may be inappropriate for use at work place : nudity or sexual suggestive content of 2D anime-style characters

All characters involved in game contents are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
DLC Girls 002 Eily Brave



The police who goes around the galaxy to catch all the vicious criminals.
That is the role of a Space Cop. Different than when used to act in the existing narrow territory,
now the supply of portal technology is achieved and the method of arresting the vicious criminals is completed.
Police men now not only work within the village, they can go around the whole universe and prevent the criminal activity.
Eily is also one of such police force. However, the new police officer Eily always makes mistakes. Especially, in front of a rough brutal criminal,
she is quite helpless and often misses them right before her eyes. Merely, Eily is not incompetent.
Because of her righteous character, she found a missing child who was alone lost in the universe and received the medal for her acheivements.
She prevented the war among the vessels.
Only in front of rough men, she becomes helpless.

The reason is simple.
Eily herself denies it, but she has the desire to be raped indiscriminately by rough men.
She couldn’t do anything since she herself was mistaken to think such imagination was fear.
Today, like any other day, Eily also gets a scolding from her boss.
Falling a sleep at the state of feeling down, Ailey opens her eyes in the glass world.

short_description: A police who goes around the galaxy to catch all the vicious criminals. However, because she is a new police officer, she always makes the same repetitive mistakes. What is her hidden desire?
supported_languages:
English, Russian, Vietnamese, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
